title: Chrome Profile & Launch Fix
description: Fix Chrome not opening, profile error messages, and 'Aw, Snap!' crashes.

steps.title: Kill Zombie Processes
steps.instruction: Task Manager (Ctrl+Shift+Esc) → End all 'Google Chrome' processes. Sometimes a hidden process prevents a new window from opening.

steps.title: Create New Profile
steps.instruction: Click Profile Icon in Chrome (top right) → Add. If the new profile works perfectly, your old profile data is corrupted.

steps.title: Rename Default User Folder
steps.instruction: Close Chrome. Navigate to '%LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data'. Rename 'Default' to 'Backup Default' and restart Chrome.

steps.title: Disable Sandbox (Last Resort)
steps.instruction: Only for isolation testing: Create Chrome shortcut → Properties → Target → add ' --no-sandbox' at the end. Use this ONLY to diagnose.

steps.title: Run Chrome Cleanup Tool
steps.instruction: Go to settings 'chrome://settings/cleanup'. Chrome will scan for harmful software that might be hijacking your browser.
